method.name: endall
method.description: Send all Notes into release. If an argument was provided, send notes of channel (argument) into release.

method.name: endhold
method.digest: End hold notes 0 = all (default, can be ommitted), 1 = last, 2 = first
method.description: End hold notes 0 = all (default, can be ommitted), 1 = last, 2 = first

method.name: printscale
method.digest: Print scalearray to the max console
method.description: Print scalearray to the max console

method.name: print
method.digest: Print info to the max console
method.description: Print info to the max console

attribute.name: mono_note_priority
attribute.digest: Choose Mono Mode: Last Note, Low Note, High Note (default Last Note)
attribute.description: Choose Mono Mode: Last Note, Low Note, High Note (default Last Note)

attribute.name: mono_steals_release
attribute.digest: If false, new monophony notes will ignore monophony notes that are in release and will generate new notes
attribute.description: If false, new monophony notes will ignore monophony notes that are in release and will generate new notes

attribute.name: output_mode
attribute.digest: Output Midi Notes or Frequencies (default Frequency)
attribute.description: Output Midi Notes or Frequencies (default Frequency)

attribute.name: scale_def_mode
attribute.digest: Define Scale by Midi Note or by Frequency (default Frequency)
attribute.description: Define Scale by Midi Note or by Frequency (default Frequency)

attribute.name: scale_fill
attribute.digest: Fill notes that are non-defined in scale_def message with MTOF
attribute.description: Fill notes that are non-defined in scale_def message with MTOF

attribute.name: scalearray_maxsize
attribute.digest: Set maximum number of entries in scale array (default 128)
attribute.description: Set maximum number of entries in scale array (default 128)
